replies.body:
You're probably experiencing some pretty nasty *Packet Loss* then. This happens if there are issues between your PC and our servers that cause the bits of data between the two to get lost along the way. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will help you configure your local network settings so they're compatible with League.

Should you encounter further issues with this, we can further troubleshoot.
